product.name: Coldest 40 oz Tumbler with Handle and Straw, 100% Leak Proof Insulated Tumbler with Lid and Straw (3 Lids), Stainless Steel Tumblers for Women & Men, Cup Holder Friendly, 36 oz (Camouflage Flag)
product.bullet_points:
• 100% Leak-Proof, Guaranteed: No more worrying about spills- Coldest water bottle with handle is engineered for a completely leak-resistant experience. With three versatile lids, including a straw option, you can confidently take your drink anywhere without a single drop escaping.
• Ice-Cold for 36+ Hours, Hot for 13+: Triple-insulated wall in Coldest leak proof tumbler locks in temperature, keeping your drinks ice-cold for over 36 hours or steaming hot for 13+. Whether it’s water, coffee, or a pre-workout shake, your last sip will be just as refreshing as the first.
• Versatile Lid Trio: One tumblr, multiple ways to sip. The Insulated V1 Sip Lid and Flip Top V3 make everyday hydration effortless, while the Chug and Blendinator are built for thicker drinks like protein shakes and smoothies.
• Ergonomic Handles with Non-Slip Grip: Built for comfort and convenience, the large ergonomic handle and non-slip rubber bottom provide a secure hold and stability, so your spill proof tumbler with straw stays put wherever you take it.
• Cup-Holder Friendly & Stylish Choices: Designed to fit 99% of cup holders, Coldest leakproof tumbler comes in 36oz and 46oz sizes and 40+ color variations, so you can sip in style anytime, anywhere.
